synopsis: Kimiko injures her hand during class and has to deal with it while Tōru brings Tansan to school with her to meet Yutaka and Miho. Later, the girls decide to get pancakes at a café where Miho happens to be working, facing trouble when Yutaka shows up out of the blue.

title.jp: Ema ni Onegai: A Happy New Year

synopsis: Yūko catches a cold so the others pay her a visit and help look after her. Later, the girls get together for the New Year's shrine visit.
